answers.answer: I failed my 1 hour test and passed the 3 hour test. Try not to eat or drink anything really sugary the day before. Even if you have gestational diabetes you'll be ok :) I've heard the 1 hour test aren't very accurate
Omg thank you so much! I've been so stressed because of this! Did you change your diet or no?
Don't worry to much just drink only liquids 12 hours before then stop drinking anything an hour before most women pass the 3 hour test the one hour test is easy to fail

question: Has any one had this? I got my first test and it was abnormal so I have to get a second 3 hour test. Someone tell me I'm going to be ok!
title: gestational diabetes
